name: FIND YOUR WINGS
description:
HAVE YOU RECIEVED A CALL FROM 1-800-GET-WING?


When someone loses their wings, we reach out. If you ever get a call from us then you may have lost your wings. It happens.

In FIND YOUR WINGS you'll be:

  • Shooting relentless squares that keep multiplying and getting stronger
  • Buying upgrades for your gun, and debuffs for your enemies
  • Increasing your defense with many, many supporters such as snipers, sawblades, tesla coils and black holes- and many more
  • Finding different wings that give you cool, special abilities

FIND YOUR WINGS has 4 stages for you to beat, and a freeplay mode where you can set your own rules.
